job.title: Software Developer -Web Development
job.description: stronguOverviewbrbrustrongWe are not just offering a job but a meaningful career Come join our passionate teambrbrAs a Fortune 50 company we hire the best employees to serve our customers making us a leader in the insurance and financial services industry State Farm embraces diversity and inclusion to ensure a workforce that is engaged builds on the strengths and talents of all associates and creates a Good Neighbor culturebrbrWe offer competitive benefits and pay with the potential for an annual financial award based on both individual and enterprise performance Our employees have an opportunity to participate in volunteer events within the community and engage in a learning culture We offer programs to assist with tuition reimbursement professional designations employee development wellness initiatives and morebrbrVisit our Careers page for more information on our benefits locations and the process of joining the State Farm teambrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrbrustrongstrongWE NEED YOUbrbrstrongEnterprise Technology is searching for a Software Developer to join Business Lines Modernization product team where the focus is on owning and managing Activity and Agreement event messages that are triggered based on certain actions within policy transactionsbrbrThis is a remarkable opportunity for a passionate software development professional who has excellent technical and communication skills solution provider mindset and thrives when given new challengesbrbrThe individual will lead and drive quality software development by engaging in forward thinking detailed design discussions amp solutions influencing the use of best practices while leveraging continuous delivery frameworks The successful candidate will effectively collaborate with business and technology partners and across productsproduct suites at multiple levelsbrbrstronguWhat You Can ExpectbrustrongulliApplies an expert understanding of development tools processes applications programming languages and environments to assignmentsliliDesigns and develops fullstack applications using industryadopted languages and frameworksliliEnables solution modernization activities through design and developmentrelated work items and architectural engagementliliProvides highest level of support for problem and issue resolution and provides technical consultation and direction to business and product team membersliliMay act as a product ownerliliLeads strategic work across the product suite and utilizes application architecture to increase efficiency and effectiveness of complex issuesliliChampion and provide guidance with an innovative mind set to deliver product solutionsliliInfluences and provides direction on product development practices coding data and testing standards code reviews and software architectureliliConducts research and integrate industry best practices into processes and potential solutionsliliDrives coordinates and delegates work of other product team membersliliDrives required product testing practices and solutions to ensure product qualitybrliulstronguQualificationsbrbrustrongstrongWe are looking for candidates who have the following experiencebrstrongulliWorking with Java C or C 25 yearsliliIn objectoriented programmingliliWith JavaScript GIT AWSliliWith API web service developmentliliWorking within Spring FrameworkliliWebservices RESTSOAP clientserver JMS database queries and optimization plugins workflowsliliSoftware delivery life cycle experience including performance acceptance testing production supportliliUnderstanding of CICD tools and practicesliliAbility to convey complex design and architectural concepts to nontechnical audiencesliliDemonstrated experience working across technical domainsplatformsbrliulstronguPreferred Qualifications But OptionalbrustrongulliGuidewire Integration frameworkliliGosu languagebrliulstronguAdditional InformationbrbrustrongIncumbency Period This position will have an 18month incumbency period beginning on the effective date of the position which must be met before the employee can post for any other lateral State Farm position Employees may be considered for leadership or Technology Engineer openings at any time and a promotional position within the same job structure ie ProfessionalTechnical or ParaprofessionalSupport after 6 months from the effective date of the position In these cases the remaining incumbency would be waived The incumbency period does not affect the atwill relationship between State Farm and the employee and does not create an employment contract nor contractual rightsbrbrApplicants are required to be eligible to lawfully work in the US immediately employer will not sponsor applicants for US work authorization eg H1B visa for this opportunitybrbrSFARMbrbrDSS
